discourse_list.title: Proposal to integrate Footprint Data Analytics with MakerDAO

content.content: Summary Footprint is a powerful yet easy-to-use analytics tool to uncover and visualize blockchain data The team consists of an experienced team of DeFi enthusiasts with diverse backgrounds, including smart contract developers, consumer internet product designers, investment managers from the banking industry, and risk modeling practitioners Footprint is committed to transforming data and information into actionable insights, to find value in every movement Proposal  This proposal advocates for providing a real-time dashboard on MakerDAO This proposal advocates for recommending MakerDAO users trying to create dashboards and queries, to develop analytical thinking, and discuss the platform development scientifically  At first, Footprint will provide a real-time dashboard for MakerDAO users. Not in a normal way relying on API only, using Bitquery and Airflow, Footprint built three commonly used modules, through conducting protocol-decoding and figuring out input and output of each pool, and analyze events behind pools. Footprint can provide automated, intelligent data integrity & data quality verification mechanisms. The system can automatically check the data before data entry, timely warning, and automatic repair Then, Footprint will be a tool that existing MakerDAO users can use. MakerDAO users build out their own dashboards and intensify interest and loyalty towards DeFi and MakerDAO Reason Users can understand and analyze the real-time data of MakerDAO and build confidence in the MakerDAO ecosystem Footprint can help members of the MakerDAO community to promote their analytical thinking and properly distribute their assets Analyze Pool reports to obtain deeper insight data, optimize DAO’s investment management strategy, and maximize the return of the platform’s investment strategy Result Footprint provides customized dashboards to promote the development of the MakerDAO ecosystem and serve users Everyone can be a project analyst and contribute insights to MakerDAO and DeFi industry You can talk with us on Discord and know more about Footprint!
content.GPT-summary: The post is an explanation of a proposal to integrate Footprint Data Analytics with MakerDAO. The proposal advocates for providing a real-time dashboard on MakerDAO and recommending MakerDAO users to develop analytical thinking and discuss the platform development scientifically. Footprint will provide a real-time dashboard for MakerDAO users and be a tool that existing MakerDAO users can use to build their own dashboards and intensify interest and loyalty towards DeFi and MakerDAO. The post also invites readers to talk with the team on Discord and know more about Footprint.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: a Curve Dashboard for reference Curve Dashboard_极速看图1920×8871 866 KB
I guess my question is how is this different from https://makerburn.com ?  What are the differentiating metrics that are missing in your opinion?
I saw you posting on Instadapp governance as well but is there any cost to Maker governance for working together?

That’s an awesome Dashboard you have there for Curve, and I’d love to see something like that for Maker. Here are some various Dashboard that could be consolidated:  Maker Dune Analytics Dashboard DAIStats Makerburn MakerDAO Risk Dashboard (Block Analytica)  MCD Voting Tracker ; Maker Delegates stats   I’d also like to see detailed data on oracle gas usage (this caused some confusion recently as seen here) Would that be feasible?
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
